about_the_game:
Ballistic Showdown is an online multiplayer game where you fight others with various power-ups.

Chaos & Explosions



Fight others and get to the top of the leaderboard, using the powerful power-ups to defeat your enemies, and climb the leaderboard!


Some of the power-ups which the game has:
  • Bomb: Explode in a radius to damage enemies
  • Sniper: Quick but small projectile that deals a lot but is hard to use
  • Wave: Large & slow projectile that damages less but is easier to use
  • Dash: Boost yourself in the direction you are facing
  • Shield: A shield that wears out after receiving a hit

What sets great players apart is their skill in movement and mastering the power-ups. enter an Arena and defeat your enemies!

Online Arenas

In online arenas, you will fight a maximum of 10 other players. The game is made in a custom engine with custom servers for an optimal online experience and cheat detection.

Discord Server

short_description: Ballistic Showdown – An ultra-satisfying, fast-paced, 2-10 player, arena-based, multiplayer, top-down 2D shooter. Grab what you can and battle it out with 2-10 players, heavily inspired by retro and arena shooters.
